message.body: So I'm at south philly eating with my dad and I think I just saw your mom walking through the parking lot. lol.
I wouldn't be surprised! Did she look like he was in a hurry and walking with insatiable purpose? Hahah. Are you in one of the plazas in Washington?
She was!! She was wearing white. Yeah I'm in the same plaza as Nam Phuong, but a different restaurant
Yes We should play pool again! It'll probably be a confidence booster playing with me since i's probably miss the ball hahah.
Was he Asian? Because I think I remember that day.
Viet Huong?
Yes, he was Asian. And yeah Viet Huong
Yup, that was Sunny. Oh I haven't been there in a while. How are you liking it?
Yes! Sunny was his name. Lol.
I liked it. My dad apparently heard it was a good place to eat.

I haven't been there in a while. I think my mom just went there earlier because I think she brought home some of their hoagies. We went there enough to a point where the lady who owns the place went to my sister'a wedding hahah.
I just told my mom you saw her and she was delighted!
Really? Wow, you must be in this plaza very often. Hahaha. She was delighted I saw her? Lol. That's funny.
It was back in the day. During high school. My mom is funny!
Does your mom drive or does someone normally have to drive her? I know you take her out on errands occasionally.
She has someone to drive her.
My mom doesn't drive.
Wait, did you not know that?
I feel like I did, but I didn't see anyone with your mom today.
Hahah when she's out of the car, she hunts on her own!
Hard to keep up with her.
Hahaha, that's good. She's very active.
Yes she is!
How's your day going? I see you got to spend some time with your day :)
Yeah, we went to look at some sites for a new property.
How's your day going?
It's fine. I'm feeling ugh. Planning to get some stuff done.
Steve...that guy I was telling you about before just asked if I wanted to go out for restaurant week with him.
He didn't specify if other spools would be there.
*people
And I'm kind of stalling right now...
Did you clarify things when we last spoke?
I don't think there was a time to clarify.
Our conversations have been friendly.
Like we've talked almost every day at this point.
I've kept it pretty friend-zone material.
So it's weird to say something when the topic hasn't come up lately.
I'm hoping he just thinks I'm another friend.

I mean it wouldn't hurt to go hang out with him and see how things go. If you're still not feeling it, it would be a good time to just clarify with him that you're in that state of mind at the moment.
Hey, you might get a free dinner! Lol
Oh no no no!
I'm not doing that!
Hahaha. You've only really spoken to him in person once right?
Things are always different in person, so you actually become very comfortable with him. Things might change.
Ask him to see if anyone else is invited.
Hahah.
I'm not comfortable with free dinners.
Yup.
I don't mind the hanging out so much.
I do mind if it is seen as a date.
And I guess that's what I've been avoiding.
Like he asked if I was free this weekend, and then we had plans for today but I'm not up for the activity.
We were planning to go rock climbing but I'm cramps.
*crampy
But I didn't want to tell him that because we're not that close.
And I don't want to continue looking like I'm blowing him off or canceling.
I'm glad I'm close enough to know that. Lol. I think the best thing is to just talk with him and let him know right off the bat.
Hahahah I'm glad too. I guess I'm kind of waiting for a cue. Like if he brings it up or mentions it, then I'll discuss and disclose how I feel.
It would save more awkwardness later... I hope.
I hope so too.
I just don't want it to come across wrong.
Just saying though, your feelings might change. Lol.
You know what, others have said that to me too. But I think at some point, you know don't you?
Like if you don't feel it at a certain point, you just don't feel it?
How long have you known him?
Almost three weeks.
How long did it take you before to know you were interested in someone?
Well I don't have tons of experiences. So I'm refer to my last relationship.
With Alex, I kind of knew the day we met.
*I'll
Hmm, well then I guess three weeks is a long time. Yeah, I would say that just clarify things with him and if he still wants to hang out, great.
Not a clue. Hahaha.
How long does it take you?
Yea, I don't know if I even knew. I think it's a dynamic thing that changes depending on the person, and on you.
I'm a weirdo so who knows!
Hahah.
Lol you're right. You aren't a weirdo.
Oh yes I am!
You're just being nice :)
Nooo we're all weird... That makes us all normal. Haha.
Do you have any pets?
I do not.
Have you ever wanted one?
Yeah, I always feel like animals like me. And I love playing with them. Why you ask?

Well lately I've come to like dogs which is kind of crazy. I have a well-known fear of animals. Especially canines! But I've met some really cute dogs/puppies lately. I kind of want one. Is it a phase?
Most likely if it's come on so quickly. I would love to have a dog. I'm fairly allergic to dogs too, which makes it tougher.
Oh no! Really? Since when?
What kind would you get?
I've always been allergic. But I love corgis
And you're right. Playing with a dog for a few hours is different from having them around all the time.
They are like babies hahah!
Plus, too much responsibility.
So you were born with it and it didn't come later in life?
An I just had to look up what corgis look like hahah!
Yup! Just think about your nephews when you long for a dog. lol.
Oh nice hahah! Okay. Essentially you realize you just compared my nephews to dogs right?
Lol. I meant the act of taking care of things.
Hahahah yea but hearing babies cry sucks. I feel so bad and they can't tell you what to do!
I know... It's probably the most frustrating part.
And the boys right now have entered like a shrieking cry phase that makes me freak out a bit.
